title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: In the SWT example ControlExample, when selecting StylesSWT.MULTI under the Text tab, the ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText component, it emits a beep sound.
EB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText component, it should not emit a beep sound.
SR:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Select StylesSWT.SINGLE.
4. Select StylesSWT.MULTI.
5. Observe the ControlExampleText component for any unexpected beep sound.
